product_name: Columbia Lay 'D' Down Insulated Jacket - Women's
long_description: Plush down fills the Columbia Lay 'D' down jacket for voluminous warmth, while faux fur in the hood adds a fun, feminine touch. Polyester shell features Omni-Shield(R) advanced repellency to resist stains and water at the surface. 550-fill-power duck down insulation hoards warmth for all-day comfort in cold conditions. Jacket has Omni-Heat(TM) thermal reflective technology on lining; thermal reflective dot lining reflects and retains body warmth while dispersing moisture and excess heat. Adjustable storm hood is removable so you can leave it behind when you don't need it; faux fur trim around hood is also removable. Zippered underarm vents regulate your core body temperature, keeping you dry and comfortable throughout the day. Removable powder skirt keeps out cold air and snow, and snaps out of the way when not in use. Stretch inner cuffs with thumbholes add warmth and an extra barrier against snow entry. Columbia Lay 'D' down jacket features waterproof zippered handwarmer pockets; interior pockets stash googles, media player and other small essentials. Drawcord hem and adjustable rip-and-stick cuffs seal out the elements and help retain warmth.
